00007 #define FLOAT_FILE 1

00011 struct vardesc {char name[13]; /* The variable name in a NetCDF file. */
00012                 char longname[50]; /* The long name of that variable. */
00013                 char hor_grid; /* The hor. grid:  u, v, h, q, or 1.   */ 
00014                 char z_grid;   /* The vert. grid:  L, i, 2, or 1.     */ 
00015                 char t_grid;   /* The time description: s, a, m, or 1.*/
00016                 char units[50];/* The dimensions of the variable.     */
00017                 char mem_size; /* The size in memory: d or f.         */
00018                 double mval;   /* The missing value */};
00019 /* For example:
00020 struct vardesc vars[2] =
00021   { {"D","Basin Depth",'h','1','1',"meter", 'd',0.},
00022     {"taux","Zonal Wind Stress",'u','1','1',"meter2 second-2", 'd',-1.e-6} };
00023 */
00024 
00025 struct varcdfinfo {int id;            /* NetCDF variable ID.          */
00026                    size_t count[4];   /* The size of the output.      */
00027                    int x_size;        /* The number of output points  */
00028                    int y_size;        /* in the x-, y- and z-         */
00029                    int z_size; };     /* directions.                  */
